name: Buddy & Kiddo's Christmas Journey
description:
A small Christmas-themed platform shooter game I made in a few days! You control Buddy and Kiddo, two good kids who had their gifts stolen by Krampy, a mischievous holiday imp! As you recover more gifts you gain more speed, more jumps, sweaters that add a layer of defense and weapons such as the Plunger Arrow or Noisy Gun!

The game was made as a present to my niece and nephew but I hope you enjoy it as well. It is short and fairly easy but has mechanics that are fun and surprising!

Here are the controls! It is highly suggested that you use a controller and in order to play 2-player, it is pretty much required. 

Player 1 (Buddy) 
Arrows - Move, Crouch 
Z - Jump, Slide (if crouching)
X - Hold to Shoot 

Player 2 (Kiddo) 
A,S,D - Move, Crouch 
J - Jump, Slide (if crouching)
K - Hold to Shoot

Controllers should work immediately if plugged in. D-input and X-input are both compatible.

Here are the Cheat buttons

F2 - Restart the Game 
F3 - Free Gift for each player 
F4 - 200 Jumps 
F5 - 10 Speed 
Pg Up - Skip to Next Room 
Pg Dn - Skip to Previous Room

That's about it. Happy Holidays and Merry Christmas!
